title: Nunu change
body:
Since a rework won't be happening any time soon for Nunu and Riot have just released some balance notes on surr20, I thought I'd share some of my ideas:

**_- Consume -_**
ADD NEW EFFECT After consuming a minion, for X secs your next AA causes Willump to want a piece of the action and slap the target dealing bonus damage. 

**_- Blood Boil -_**
For 10 seconds, Nunu gains extra Attack Speed, Movement Speed and AP. 
AA'ing or using abilities during this time gives you a stack of 'Blood Boil'. Upon reaching 5 stacks of 'Blood Boil', Blood Boil turns into an aura surrounding Nunu and the effects become doubled for the remaining duration.  

**_- Ice Blast -_**
*Is now a lobbed skill shot (like corkis bomb).
If Ice blast is a direct hit, deal damage and slow target significantly while marking them. If Nunu AA's a marked target, he blasts the area in front of him in a cone dealing damage to all enemies hit, briefly slowing them.
If Ice blast misses, create an area of terrain that significantly impairs enemy movement. Lasts X secs. (could work similar to yoricks E)

_**- Absolute Zero -**_
*If this could be done I reckon it would be super fun to play but would prob need to wait till full champ rework...*

When activating ult, Nunu charges his ult like he does currently. 
HOWEVER upon activating ult, Willump jumps off Nunu (in a chosen direction) at which point the player then controls Willump. 
Willump can only AA but each hit will briefly disrupt enemies with a 0.2 sec stun.
When Nunu stops channeling, Willump jumps back onto Nunu.

replies.body:
Nunu Jumps off of wilump (Wilump is the yeti)

Other than that seems like a reasonable change
